languages.text: "В любом случае я вот что хотел сказать... Спасибо, что меня выслушали! За дюжину лет, что я провел на Футфоле, никто не досиживал до конца моей истории. Так приятно наконец выложить все, что накопилось в душе!"

"Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"
languages.original_text: "В любом случае я вот что хотел сказать... Спасибо, что меня выслушали! За дюжину лет, что я провел на Футфоле, никто не досиживал до конца моей истории. Так приятно наконец выложить все, что накопилось в душе!"

traits.locale_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person stayed long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

"Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person stayed long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

"Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

"Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

"Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

languages.text: 「それはともかく…私の話を聞いてくれてありがとうございます！フットフォールで過ごした十数年間、私の話を最後まで聞いてくれた人はひとりもいませんでした。私の心に重くのしかかっていたものを、こうして打ち明けることができて本当に嬉しいです！」
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: 「それはともかく…私の話を聞いてくれてありがとうございます！フットフォールで過ごした十数年間、私の話を最後まで聞いてくれた人はひとりもいませんでした。私の心に重くのしかかっていたものを、こうして打ち明けることができて本当に嬉しいです！」

languages.text: “尽管如此，我还是想说……谢谢您愿意听我把话讲完！我在落脚港这十几年里，根本没有人愿意留在我身边，听我把故事讲完。能和您说说这些一直压在我心头的事情，我真是太开心了！”
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: “尽管如此，我还是想说……谢谢您愿意听我把话讲完！我在落脚港这十几年里，根本没有人愿意留在我身边，听我把故事讲完。能和您说说这些一直压在我心头的事情，我真是太开心了！”

languages.text: «Fuera cual fuera el caso, solo quería decirle que... ¡gracias por escucharme! En los doce años que he pasado en Paso, nadie se había quedado para escuchar mi historia hasta el final. ¡Es un placer haber compartido todo lo que tenía guardado en la cabeza!».
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: «Fuera cual fuera el caso, solo quería decirle que... ¡gracias por escucharme! En los doce años que he pasado en Paso, nadie se había quedado para escuchar mi historia hasta el final. ¡Es un placer haber compartido todo lo que tenía guardado en la cabeza!».

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je tenais à vous remercier de m'avoir écouté. Depuis mon arrivée à Castel il y a une douzaine d'années, c'est la première fois que quelqu'un me laisse raconter mon histoire jusqu'au bout. C'est un réel plaisir d'avoir partagé tout ce qui me pesait sur le cœur ! »
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je tenais à vous remercier de m'avoir écouté. Depuis mon arrivée à Castel il y a une douzaine d'années, c'est la première fois que quelqu'un me laisse raconter mon histoire jusqu'au bout. C'est un réel plaisir d'avoir partagé tout ce qui me pesait sur le cœur ! »

languages.text: "Wie dem auch sei, ich wollte nur sagen ... danke, dass Ihr mir zugehört habt! In den über zwölf Jahren auf Footfall ist noch nie jemand lange genug geblieben, um das Ende meiner Geschichte zu hören. Es ist eine große Freude, alles zu teilen, was meinen Geist belastet hat!"
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie dem auch sei, ich wollte nur sagen ... danke, dass Ihr mir zugehört habt! In den über zwölf Jahren auf Footfall ist noch nie jemand lange genug geblieben, um das Ende meiner Geschichte zu hören. Es ist eine große Freude, alles zu teilen, was meinen Geist belastet hat!"

languages.text: "Olsun, yine de bir diyeceğim var... Anlattıklarımı dinlediğiniz için teşekkür ederim! Binliman'a geleli on yıldan fazla oldu, kimse de hikâyemin sonunu merak edip dinlemedi. İçimi kemiren tüm dertlerimi paylaşınca, üstümden bir yük kalktı harbiden!"
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, I just wanted to say... Thank you for hearing me out! Over the dozen years I have spent on Footfall, not one person has hung around long enough to listen to my story to the end. It's such a delight to have shared everything that's been weighing on my mind!"

traits.locale_text: "Olsun, yine de bir diyeceğim var... Anlattıklarımı dinlediğiniz için teşekkür ederim! Binliman'a geleli on yıldan fazla oldu, kimse de hikâyemin sonunu merak edip dinlemedi. İçimi kemiren tüm dertlerimi paylaşınca, üstümden bir yük kalktı harbiden!"
